name: One Late Night at the office
name_original: One Late Night at the office
description:
Development time provided: 6 hours. Game inspiration: Stanley Parable

This game was made for BYOG 2022 game jam. Sadly I wasn't able to submit it on time due to some random unexpected tasks (it wasn't worth submitting anyway). Better luck next time.

One late night in the office an employee wakes up from a nap, dizzy, only to discover that the world around him feels different. Is he still dreaming? You find out!

Players must walk through the office rooms until they reach the end.

Weapons: Camera (that turns enemies (grey boxes) into cheese.

Controls:

WASD: Move

E: Interact, open doors

Left Mouse Button: click while looking at grey boxes (enemy placeholders) to turn them into cheese.

Scroll wheel: to switch between flashlight and camera.
